channel.title: New rs2 project
channel.description:
hi all i am a novice server developer and i am working on a server almost completley like the actual rs2 server here is more info project precentage complete [shadow=red,left] 0.1% [/shadow] i am still calculating npc spawns non mem area [shadow=red,left] 100% [/shadow] npc spawns mem area 100% special attacks [shadow=red,left] 0% [/shadow] database [shadow=red,left] 0% [/shadow] interface [shadow=red,left] 0% [/shadow] this one might take a while this will be updated when i start on more stuff needs (player mods and gold crowns will be given if i am helped) npc spawn points quest stuff :eek: a wp to the beggining of tut island will be updated post of what you think
[center] staff positions avalable [/center] [center] beginner coder [/center] [center] - [/center] [center] - [/center] [center] - [/center] [center] - [/center]
[center] npc postion writer (i despertley need one this will get a auto gold crown ) [/center] [center] - [/center]
[center] game moderators (gold crowns) [/center] [center] no positions till atleast 10% complete [/center]
pm me if you want a position
rules no flaming not much off topic and enjoy your self
------------------------------------------------------ [code] added a sheep!! :eek:. added all of lumbys sheep for now starthing on cows [/code] total 1 updates

item.title: New rs2 project
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

I don’t see a novice server developer doing all this. Good luck anyhow, I’m sure you will learn alot!

By the way, you don’t need to know Frames, nor HTML to develop a website. Although it does help alot.
